Player History
Had first career hit on 4/5/1985, off Andy McGaffigan (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 4/5/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Traded from Los Angeles to Oakland on 2/6/1988 (Going to LAD: P Darryl Kile, P Darrel Akerfelds, SS Jose Offerman. Going to OAK: P Bob Welch)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1988, going 4-0, 1.84...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1988, winning 2 games with a 1.65 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1988, going 6-0, 1.28...
Won Cy Young Award in 1988, going 25-3, 2.98 ERA...
10/27/1988: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $7,640,000 per year, for 4 years.
Injured on 5/2/1990 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
